description: "Initiative on the Forest Economy" is an effort to create partnerships between local communities as custodians of forests, industries as the users and government as facilitators of wealth creation.
tasks: Led the end-to-end design, development, and deployment process of the mobile-ﬁrst application suite for the Forest Governance initiative.
Designed a secure and accountable platform to resolve issues related to forest rights.

Spearheaded the creation of an intuitive and lightweight medium for the community to record up-to-date information on the lands (their ownership, usability, resource value, etc.), ultimately helping in the research studies.

Leveraged the applications for a positive impact in over 300 local communities of Odisha, Himachal Pradesh, and Jharkhand by directly beneﬁtting the lives of 400-500 forest dwellers and community members.
